title: My account got reset ? Please help !
body:
I didn't play for long time but when i connected they ask me for a summoner name so I entered
one. Now im lvl 1 I have no champ ,no runes ,no rp , no ip, no skin, nothing . Please help ! Riot I need you !

replies.body: Accounts don't reset like this, so it's possible that your logging onto the wrong account!  Hit us up through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) so our account recovery team can help figure this out.  Hang tight until then!

How many time will it take ?
Cause i put over 200 $ on this acount so i really want it back . Thank you
I have still the same problem when i connect im lvl 1 and all the other things (the new summoner name and no rp) .
